A city full of thieves, where thievery is the main vocation. Each gang’s bread and butter is counting on the loot stolen
When the game starts, each team is given with 15 gemstones which needs to be hidden from other teams, in various places inside the college campus.

All the given gems must be hidden within first 15 minutes of the game(one minute for one gem) . To place a gem, one must go to the intended location where one wants to hide the gem, and press the place button. If a team takes more than one minute to place a gem, the gem shall be placed at the current location of the team.

After placing all the given gems, the team ventures into hunting down gems hidden by other teams. When a gem is at a thief’s vicinity, he/she can steal the gem. The stolen gems are to be kept in a bag which can hold at-most of three gems. If the bag is full, to steal the next gem, the ones inside the bag must be placed. LET THE LOOT BEGIN!!!
